create table dados_cliente (
  id bigserial primary key,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, 
  telefone text, 
  nomewpp text,
  atendimento_ia text,
  Setor text
);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
  id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ, 
  phone TEXT,
  nomewpp TEXT, 
  bot_message TEXT,
  user_message TEXT, 
  message_type TEXT,
  active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE
);
